thread.title: Robert

author: Robert
title: Robert
text: I love going to the store because I can always find something to buy even when I have no particular need in mind. On line the find and purchase is pretty easy. Streamline descriptions without a lot of disorienting advertising. Prices are the same as BestBuy, Amazon and Ebay. No tax and no shipping is a key difference. They need to develop a loyalty system to get frequent buyers to buy again for their own success. B+H bucks or similar.
